text: @jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden So Trump admitted that he throttled testing for Covid-19 so our numbers would look better and showed a complete disregard for the health and safety of US citizens. Last I checked, willfully killing 115K people makes someone a genocidal maniac.
